mapper.select: select id, code_id, id, code_id, user_id, problem_id, score, result, description, space, time, dialect, code_length, submit_time from "record" where valid offset #{offset} limit #{limit};

select r.id, r.code_id, r.user_id, r.problem_id, r.score, r.result, r.description, r.space, r.time, r.dialect, r.code_length, r.submit_time, p.title as problem_title, u.avatar, u.username from "record" r join "problem" p on r.problem_id = p.id and p.valid join "user" u on r.user_id = u.id and u.valid where r.valid order by r.submit_time desc offset #{offset} limit #{limit};
